title: Hundreds Of African Migrants Feared Dead After Boat Capsizes In Mediterranean
teaser: Up to 400 migrants are missing and feared dead after their boat capsized in the Mediterranean Sea Tuesday. Tens of thousands of migrants have attempted the hazardous journey from Africa to Europe and around 500 have died so far this year.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
